mapper.select: SELECT S.STUDY_NO, S.STUDY_NAME, S.STUDY_MAX_COUNT, TO_CHAR(S.STUDY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STUDY_DATE, S.STUDY_TYPE, S.STUDY_PERIOD, S.STUDY_MAIN_IMG, SM.STUDY_CAP FROM STUDY S JOIN STUDY_MEMBER SM ON S.STUDY_NO = SM.STUDY_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON SM.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE S.STUDY_NO = #{studyNo} AND SM.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND S.STUDY_DEL_FL = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO STUDY_RULE USING DUAL ON (STUDY_NO = #{studyNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET RULE_CONTENT = #{ruleContent} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (STUDY_NO, RULE_CONTENT) VALUES (#{studyNo}, #{ruleContent})
mapper.select: SELECT CALENDAR_NO, CALENDAR_TITLE, TO_CHAR("START", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "START", TO_CHAR("END", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "END", STUDY_NO, SC.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM STUDY_CALENDAR SC JOIN MEMBER M ON SC.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE STUDY_NO = #{studyNo} ORDER BY "START" ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_CALENDAR (CALENDAR_NO, CALENDAR_TITLE, "START", "END", STUDY_NO, MEMBER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_STUDY_CALENDAR.NEXTVAL, #{title}, TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{studyNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT SM.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, SM.STUDY_CAP FROM STUDY_MEMBER SM JOIN MEMBER M ON SM.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE SM.STUDY_NO = #{studyNo} AND M.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY SM.STUDY_CAP DESC
